import math
for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    cnt_odd = sum((1 for a in map(int, input().split()) if a % 2 == 1))
    cnt_even = n - cnt_odd
    if cnt_even == 0:
        print(0)
        continue
    if x % 2 == 1:
        print(math.ceil(cnt_even / 2))
        continue
    if x % 2 == 0 and cnt_odd == 0:
        print(-1)
        continue
    print(cnt_even)
